docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Three years and three months after Libby Zion died at New York Hospital, the State Health Commissioner last week proposed a solution to a contributing problem - the physician fatigue that can lead to ''woefully'' inadequate care.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Three years and three months after Libby Zion died at New York Hospital, the State Health Commissioner last week proposed a solution to a contributing problem - the physician fatigue that can lead to ''woefully'' inadequate care.

byline.original: By MARY CONNELLY AND CARLYLE C. DOUGLAS
